vote.title: Authorize (1) reprogramming of funds in an amount not to exceed $1,334,500.00 $1,057,000.00 from Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund originally allocated for Bachman Recreation Center in the amount of $100,000.00; Overlake Park Bleachers in the amount of $45,000.00; Frances Rizzo Park in the amount of $225,000.00; Stafford Park in the amount of $198,000.00; Bishop Flores Park in the amount of $387,500.00; Maria Luna Dog Park in the amount of $300,000.00 $410,000.00; Samuell Grand Shade Structure in the amount of $50,000.00; and Pueblo Park in the amount of $29,000.000; and (2) a construction contract for the construction of the Aquatics Phase 2 Project at Bachman Regional Aquatic Center located at 2750 Bachman Drive - The Fain Group, Inc., best value proposer of three - Not to exceed $7,158,650.00 - Financing: Equity Revitalization Capital Fund ($300,000.00 $500,000.00), Recreation Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($1,048,526.00), and Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($5,810,124.00 $5,610,124.00)
vote.description: Authorize (1) reprogramming of funds in an amount not to exceed $1,334,500.00 $1,057,000.00 from Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund originally allocated for Bachman Recreation Center in the amount of $100,000.00; Overlake Park Bleachers in the amount of $45,000.00; Frances Rizzo Park in the amount of $225,000.00; Stafford Park in the amount of $198,000.00; Bishop Flores Park in the amount of $387,500.00; Maria Luna Dog Park in the amount of $300,000.00 $410,000.00; Samuell Grand Shade Structure in the amount of $50,000.00; and Pueblo Park in the amount of $29,000.000; and (2) a construction contract for the construction of the Aquatics Phase 2 Project at Bachman Regional Aquatic Center located at 2750 Bachman Drive - The Fain Group, Inc., best value proposer of three - Not to exceed $7,158,650.00 - Financing: Equity Revitalization Capital Fund ($300,000.00 $500,000.00), Recreation Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($1,048,526.00), and Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($5,810,124.00 $5,610,124.00)
